name: Assault Vest
rules: Any damage done to the Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy attached to them is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Brigette
rules: Search your deck for 1 Basic Pokémon-EX or 3 Basic Pokémon (except for Pokémon-EX) and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Buddy
rules: Each player puts a Pokémon from his or her discard pile into his or her hand. (Your opponent chooses first.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Fisherman
rules: Put 4 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Float Stone
rules: The Pokémon this card is attached to has no Retreat Cost.

name: Giovanni's Scheme
rules: Choose 1:• Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand.• During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Glalie Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Glalie-EX.

name: Heavy Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon with a Retreat Cost of 3 or more, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Heavy Boots
rules: If the Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is 3 or more, that Pokémon gets +20 HP and can't be Confused. (If that Pokémon is currently Confused, remove that Special Condition.)

name: Houndoom Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Houndoom-EX.

name: Judge
rules: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Mewtwo Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Mewtwo-EX.

name: Parallel City
rules: Choose which way this card faces before you play it. This â†“ player can't have more than 3 Benched Pokémon. (When this card comes into play, this â†“ player discards Benched Pokémon until he or she has 3 Pokémon on the Bench.)
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Professor's Letter
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Reserved Ticket
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card, shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of it.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Skyla
rules: Search your deck for a Trainer card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Super Rod
rules: Shuffle up to 3 in any combination of Pokémon and basic Energy cards from your discard pile back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Town Map
rules: Turn all of your Prize cards face up. (Those Prize cards remain face up for the rest of the game.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rainbow Energy
rules: This card provides Colorless Energy. While in play, this card provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon.
